message:
Four humongous scandals so far! And the War Crimes Tribunal is still proceeding. It's not just 'A' scandal, it's many. We wonder what the next one will be...

1. Skype scandal- Prohibited collusion between judiciary, prosecution, and the executive branch via an external consultant http://www.economist.com/news/briefing/21568349-week-chairman-bangladeshs-international-crimes-tribunal-resigned-we-explain

2. Witness disappearing (Bali)- 1971 http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JEXYgNPM2IU

3. Leaked video; admitting taking bribery http://ictscandal.blogspot.co.uk/2013/09/nannu-leaks-this-aint-just-any.html Nannu Leaks: This ain't just any #ICTScandal (with full video evidence)

4. Draft verdict leaked - Salahuddin Quader verdict was already drafted long ago by law ministry on 23 May 2013. Read it http://t.co/oEQ3muYv5T

#FlawedICT via some good soul of this nation
